text: Nocardioides bigeumensis is a gram-positive bacterium from the genus Nocardioides that has been isolated from farming field soil on Bigeum Island, South Korea.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides bigeumensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase bigeumensis Category:Bacteria described in 2008
title: Nocardioides bigeumensis
